reason.content: It is your legal obligation to ensure that you have the permission from the person you are searching before performing a credit search. This search will leave an electronic "footprint".
reason.title: Consumer Search

germanDirectorReason.content:
Please note when searching for the management of a Company hereinafter, which is usually an initial step for further research on the Creditsafe database, that search lists are provided for the sole purpose to assist you in performing a quick and efficient search. Information on natural persons which are irrelevant for your business purpose triggering the research, must not be reviewed pursuant to German data protection legislation. A search for shareholders and managing directors has to be justified by an outweighing legitimate interest of yours. Therefore, you are only entitled to use the respective search function, in case you need the information for credit decisions, to initiate business relationships with a default risk or for collection purposes. Please also duly consider the following requirements under data protection legislation. 
Searches are only permitted for a specific shareholder or managing director. Please be informed that we do take samples to verify the proper use of the search functionality by our customers and their compliance with the rules described above.
The easiest and fastest way to find the required information on a specific shareholder/managing director is to insert name, first name and date of birth of the person you are searching for into the search mask.
In case you do not know the date of birth and/or the correct spelling of the name and/or the first name of the shareholder/managing director you are searching for, our system still allows you to perform an error tolerant search. It will try to display the searched for shareholder/managing director despite of incomplete information provided by you. You should in this case only click on and review the details of the correct person.
germanDirectorReason.title: Managing Director Search

freshInvestigation.cantFindMessage: Can't find what you're looking for?
freshInvestigation.noResultsMessage: No search results found, please try refining your search. Alternatively order a Fresh Investigation.
freshInvestigation.orderFreshInvestigationMessage: Why not order a Fresh Investigation. We can perform an entirely new investigation for you on the chosen business by gathering the most up to date information available.
freshInvestigation.performFreshInvestigationMessage: We can perform an entirely new investigation for you on the chosen business gathering the most up to date information available.
freshInvestigation.verificationReportMessage: Please be aware that Verification Reports may only contain minimal data, if you would like a more detailed company report order a Fresh Investigation and our team will create an up to date comprehensive report.

idrReport.warningText: Please do not close this page as you may still be charged for the report

mapLink.description: Want to know more about our International Data Coverage?

noFiltersAvailable: No additional search options available for your selected countries.
offlineReport: Indicates an offline Company Report from the Creditsafe International Database
onlineReport: Indicates an instantly available online Company Report from the Creditsafe International Database

it.visuraErrorAlertText: We encountered an error when trying to download the Official Visura from InfoCamere. Please try again.
it.visuraInfoAlertText: We're currently querying InfoCamere for the Official Visura. Please wait for the processing to finish. This might take up to 10 minutes (depending on the size of the document).

search-page.searchFooterWarningMessage: Please be aware that Credit Scores and Recommended Credit Limits for Ukrainian businesses are currently suspended due to the conflict in Ukraine. We continue to monitor the situation and will resume Scoring once data becomes readily available again.
search-page.title: Advanced Company Search

searchRedirection.databaseHover: Access reports from over 160 countries instantly online. Our International Reports are available via a package upgrade, which you can request from your account manager.
searchRedirection.description: If you would like to add access to any of the reports to your account simply call your account manager on 855-551-6903. We will endeavour to add any additional reports to your accounts within 24hrs.
searchRedirection.footer: Please note you will not be charged for a report until you have confirmed your order.
searchRedirection.freshInvestigationOption: Alternatively order a Fresh Investigation and we will perform an investigation on the chosen business for you by gathering the most up to date information available.
searchRedirection.internationalPayAsYouGo: International Fresh Investigation (Pay As You Go)
searchRedirection.payAsYouGoHover: Request a completely new investigation to be performed on your chosen business. Working with local agents, will compile a report for you within 2 and 10 business days utilising the most up to date information available.
searchRedirection.plcOptionDescription: Reports for the selected country are not currently available online however, we might still hold an up to date company report within our Worldwide PLC Database. Would you like to complete a Worldwide PLC Search?
searchRedirection.plcTitle: Have you searched our Worldwide PLC database?
searchRedirection.prepaidHover: Request a completely new investigation to be performed on your chosen business. Working with local agents, will compile a report for you within 2 and 10 business days utilising the most up to date information available.
searchRedirection.puertoRicoInformation: Did you know that Puerto Rico is a US territory? Please consider searching United States with the State filter set to Puerto Rico.
